alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:42PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wakulla, eastern Gadsden, southeastern Liberty and Leon Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Havana to 16 miles north of Carrabelle. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Florida State University, Midway, Tallahassee Community College, Havana, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, Quincy, Doak Campbell Stadium, Sopchoppy, Lake Bradford, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Gaither Community Center, Wakulla Springs, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Walker Ford Community Center and South City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Liberty
